description:
A warm, cozy hideaway for the little ones in your life. Thick, terry cotton and hood makes it extra cozy. A front pouch pocket provides a spot to warm cold hands.

  • OEKO-TEX® 100 certified cotton is tested for harmful substances, to give you confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care
  • Provides a private, and soft, place for kids to change
  • Roomy hood provides a hideaway for kids wanting a little me time
  • Front pouch pocket
  • Width across chest is 18 inches
name: Slowtide Changing Poncho - Children to Youths
